    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109523</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109523</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces  between parallel current-carrying wires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte zwischen parallelen aktuell-tragenden 
Leitungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces entre les fils actuel-portants 
parallèles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças entre fios atual-carregando paralelos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze fra i legare corrente-trasportanti 
paralleli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις μεταξύ των παράλληλων παρών-φέρνοντας 
καλωδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas entre los alambres actual-que llevan 
paralelos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the forces between two current-carrying wires placed in parallel with currents flowing in opposite directions (left) and currents flowing in the same direction (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current-carrying wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die Kräfte zwischen zwei
aktuell-tragenden Leitungen, die parallel zu den Strömen plaziert 
werden, die in entgegengesetzte Richtungen fließen (nach links) und 
den Strömen, die in die gleiche Richtung fließen (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent les forces entre deux 
fils actuel-portants placés parallèlement aux courants entrant dans 
des directions opposées (à gauche) et aux courants entrant dans la 
même direction (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram as forças entre dois 
fios atual-carregando colocados na paralela com as correntes que fluem
em sentidos opostos (à esquerda) e as correntes que fluem no mesmo 
sentido (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano le forze fra due 
legare corrente-trasportanti disposti in parallelo con le correnti che
entrano nei sensi opposti (a sinistra) e le correnti che entrano nello
stesso senso (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν τις δυνάμεις μεταξύ 
δύο παρών-φέρνοντας καλωδίων που τοποθετούνται παράλληλα με τα 
ρεύματα που ρέουν στις αντίθετες κατευθύνσεις (αριστερά) και τα 
ρεύματα που ρέουν στην ίδια κατεύθυνση (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran las fuerzas entre 
dos alambres actual-que llevan colocados en paralelo a las corrientes 
que fluyen en direcciones opuestas (a la izquierda) y a las corrientes
que fluyen en la misma dirección (derecha).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell-tragende Leitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
